In the Western Regions, each month is divided into two parts: the white and black fortnights. From the first to the fifteenth day of the month is the white fortnight, because the light gradually increases and becomes bright. From the sixteenth to the thirtieth day of the month is the black fortnight, because the light gradually decreases and becomes dark.
MaÃ±juÅ›rÄ« Bodhisattva.
He spoke a verse on the days and times, saying:
The first, third, fifth, seventh, tenth, eleventh, and thirteenth,
On the second, white and black fortnights, whatever is done will be accomplished.
The third, seventh, tenth, and fourteenth days are inauspicious,
Four days and eight nights, one night and fifteen days
What is meant by one night?
Eleven nights.
The reason for the verse is to value brevity.
In this dark and bright month, day and night are not accomplished
After noon and midnight, all are auspicious
Selecting a day, every time one enters the month,

The first day, the sixteenth day, the third day, the eighteenth day, the fifth day, the twentieth day, the seventh day, the twenty-second day, the tenth day, the twenty-fifth day, the eleventh day, the twenty-sixth day, the thirteenth day, the twenty-eighth day.
Above are auspicious days.
Auspicious matters done will surely be accomplished.
Selecting a time, selecting a time to enter the month,
The fourth day, the eighth day, the eleventh day, the fifteenth day, the eighteenth day, the twenty-second day, the twenty-fifth day, the twenty-ninth day.
Above are the days and times of day and night.
What is done is all inauspicious, and things are not accomplished.
Even evil should not be done, let alone good deeds.
It is like planting things on salty and barren land where nothing grows.
Enter the month.
The second, sixth, ninth, twelfth, fourteenth, seventeenth, nineteenth, twenty-first, twenty-third, twenty-fourth, twenty-seventh, and thirtieth days.
The above are regular days.
If it is combined with good lunar mansions and good planets, then it is auspicious.
If it is combined with evil lunar mansions and evil planets, then it is inauspicious.
In the case of evil and inauspicious daytime,
after noon it is generally auspicious.
In the case of evil and inauspicious nighttime, after midnight it is also generally auspicious.

To the right, for each month.
The auspicious and inauspicious uses of the day are as before.

The good and evil of day and night are all as before in the Jia commentary.
The chart of the twenty-seven lunar mansions and twelve palaces uses the twenty-eight lunar mansions of the Tang dynasty, excluding the lunar mansion of the ox in the Western countries.
Because the heavenly lord takes care of it.
The twelve lunar mansions are still the twelve sequences of the Tang dynasty.
It is also said that in the Western countries, the years are recorded using the twelve earthly branches starting withå­ä¸‘,
and the days are recorded using the stars and planets.
They do not use the sexagenary cycle.
Because the lunar mansions and planets have no merit for people, but are especially important for affairs.
The sutra says that the sun has one times the power, the lunar mansions have four times the power,
the planets have eight times the power,
and the power of a good time is ten thousand times.
In the Western countries, they use the lunar mansion of the new moon on the fifteenth day of the month
as the name of a month.
Therefore, the second month is called the lunar mansion of è§’. In the Western countries, the second month is the beginning of the year.
Because the path is equal to the bright and correct, the division of day and night is suspended.
At that time, the weather is good, the qi is harmonious, the grasses and trees flourish and grow, and everything increases. Therefore,
Brahma Heaven is used as the origin of the calendar.
The third month is called the Di month.
The fourth month is called the Xin month.
The fifth month is called the Ji month.
The sixth month is called the NÃ¼ month.
The seventh month is called the Shi month.
The eighth month is called the Lou month.
The ninth month is called the Mao month. The Sanskrit name for the star Mao is KÄrttika.
In the Western countries, the rainy season retreat begins on the fifteenth day of the fifth month.
After the completion of the retreat on the fifteenth day of the eighth month, the self-admittance ceremony is held on the fifteenth day of the ninth month.
Therefore, it is called KÄrttika.
It simply takes the name of the star.
Now, the KÄrttika in China
is a false interpretation of the event.
It is a great mistake to give a separate explanation. The tenth month is called the Zui month.ğŸ”½The eleventh month is called the Gui month.
The twelfth month is called the Xing month.
The first month is called the Wing month. If you want to know the day of the twenty-seven lunar mansions,
you must first know the lunar mansion on the day of the new moon.
If you want to count from one day to the fifteenth day of the waxing moon,
then start from the lunar mansion below the fifteenth day.
Count backwards to know.
If you want to know from the sixteenth day onwards to the thirtieth day,
then start from the lunar mansion below the fifteenth day.
Count forwards and you will get it.
But rely on this to determine it. For example, on the fifteenth day of the second month, it is the lunar mansion of Jiao.
On the fourteenth day, it is the lunar mansion of Zhen.
On the thirteenth day, it is the lunar mansion of Yi.
If you seek after the fifteenth day,
then on the fifteenth day, it is the lunar mansion of Jiao.
On the sixteenth day, it is the lunar mansion of Kang. On the seventeenth day, it is the lunar mansion of Di.
The others are all modeled after this.
If you want to seek the lunar mansion to which a person belongs,
then on the chart,
take the lunar mansion below the fifteenth day of the birth month.
From this, look at the lunar mansion and count backwards and forwards.
Stop when you reach the day of birth.
Then seek the lunar mansion to which that person belongs.
There is also a method to roughly calculate a person's natal lunar mansion.
First, write down the number of days of birth.
Again, add thirteen in vain.
Then, starting from the lunar mansion of the new moon in the month of birth,
use the number of the upper position to subtract in order.
Stop when the count is finished.
Then you will obtain the natal lunar mansion to which that person belongs. Suppose there is a person
born on the seventeenth day of the second month.
First, write down the seventeenth day as the position.
Again, add thirteen in vain to get thirty.
Then, starting from the lunar mansion of the new moon in the second month, namelyè§’,
äº¢,æ°,æˆ¿, the twenty-seven lunar mansions, subtract them in order until the remainder is three.
Then, subtract one fromè§’,
subtract two fromäº¢, and subtract three fromæ°.
Then that person is born under the lunar mansion ofæ°.
The others should follow this example.ğŸ”½As for determining the direct rule of the lunar mansions,
it is when the moon is in the position of the lunar mansion,
then that lunar mansion is in direct rule.
Moreover, the moon's movement has slow and fast speeds.
How can one know the north and south, front and back of the lunar mansions and the moon?
Then, one can understand by seeking with the following verse. The verse says:
The moon is said to be in conjunction with the lunar mansion before it arrives at the sixth lunar mansion. The moon and the twelve lunar mansions are in conjunction to the left and right.
The nine lunar mansions move like a calf following its mother. It should be known by counting from the lunar mansion Gui.
The phrase the moon is said to be in conjunction with the lunar mansion before it arrives at the sixth lunar mansion means:ğŸ”½From the lunar mansion Gui,
Lou, Wei, Mao, Pi, and Zi.
These six lunar mansions,
the moon has not yet reached the lunar mansion.
The moon is then said to be in the direct position of that lunar mansion.
The phrase the moon and the twelve lunar mansions are in conjunction to the left and right means:
The twelve lunar mansions such as Zhang, Wing, Zhen, Jiao, Kang, Di, Fang, etc.
On the day of these twelve lunar mansions,
the moon is in front of or behind the lunar mansion, to the left or right,
and it is taken to belong to the use of that lunar mansion.
The phrase the nine lunar mansions move like a calf following its mother means:
The moon is paired as the mother,
and the lunar mansions are paired as the calf.ğŸ”½Then, the moon is in front of the lunar mansion,
and the lunar mansion is behind the moon.
Like the image of a cow mother.
You should use this verse to verify it with the heavens.
Then the past moon will be used without error.
These are all the secret teachings of the great sages.
